title: 端口被占[悬赏我所有的金粒]
author: a614448085
txt_content:
显示这些：Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will
 likely be removed in a future release
Warning, your max perm gen size is not set or less than 128mb. It is recommended
 you restart Java with the following argument: -XX:MaxPermSize=128M
Please see http://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/changing-permgen-size/ for more details
and more in-depth instructions.
Loading libraries, please wait...
[18:11:28 INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.7.2
[18:11:28 INFO]: Loading properties
[18:11:28 INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
[18:11:28 INFO]: This server is running CraftBukkit version git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.
3-122-gb58e277 (MC: 1.7.2) (Implementing API version 1.7.2-R0.4-SNAPSHOT)
[18:11:29 INFO]: Server Ping Player Sample Count: 12
[18:11:29 INFO]: Using 4 threads for Netty based IO
[18:11:29 INFO]: Generating keypair
[18:11:30 INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on [隐藏]
[18:11:30 WARN]: **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[18:11:30 WARN]: The exception was: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign reques
ted address: bind
[18:11:30 WARN]: Perhaps a server is already running on that port?

求助啊！！！

replies.author: 梓
replies.txt_content:
可用在
server.properties中更改其他端口
server-port=25565
或者结束占用端口程序

replies.author: Miracles_xiu
replies.txt_content: 你估计是开了BC服务器，正常端口都是25565，你估计开了两个子服都是25565，去server.properties.yml这个文件把server-port=25565这一栏改为server-port=25566或者其他和25565不一样的

replies.author: a614448085
replies.txt_content:
Miracles_xiu 发表于 2016-5-15 18:58
你估计是开了BC服务器，正常端口都是25565，你估计开了两个子服都是25565，去server.properties.yml这个文 ...
试过了，我用我QQ前面的几个数字都不行

replies.author: a614448085
replies.txt_content:
逗比桃 发表于 2016-5-15 18:30
可用在
server.properties中更改其他端口
server-port=25565
怎么结束？

replies.author: creeper2002
replies.txt_content:
如果更改server.properties还是不行的话。可以尝试登陆MODEM更改虚拟服务器的吧…
很久未关注有错请指出……

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content: 端口被占用了吧,把默认25565改成其他的

replies.author: a614448085
replies.txt_content:
Innovators 发表于 2016-5-16 21:49
端口被占用了吧,把默认25565改成其他的
改过了，不行

replies.author: 喵喵人
replies.txt_content:
多改几个啊。。。。

还有如果是内网开服
ip是不用填的

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
如果是面板服,端口是自动分配的你没有修改过,请联系服务商
如果是独立主机.vps或者家里电脑开服,请打开cmd,输入netstat -b并寻找占用了端口的程序然后在任务管理器干掉即可

replies.author: a614448085
replies.txt_content: 现在显示登入失败：无效的会话[请尝试重启你的游戏]
